title: The Reluctant Informant
description: The player cautiously offers a vague clue about the missing goods, hinting at a trade that could benefit both parties. However, they hold back key details, sensing Meredith’s urgency.
dialogue: The player hesitates, looking around before saying, 'I might have heard something... but you’re going to have to sweeten the deal for me, Meredith.'

npc_reactions.Meredith Stout: Her eyes narrow slightly, intrigued but wary. 'Sweeten the deal, huh? You must think you're in a position to bargain. I'll play along, but don't expect my patience to last long.'

Meredith Stout.goal: Pressure the player to learn information about them, including whether the player has companions, who they work for, and if they stole the robot.

Meredith Stout.trigger_condition: discerns that the player might have the information needed
Meredith Stout.goal: Express urgency and insist on a favorable negotiation.

Meredith Stout.trigger_condition: feels challenged by the player's vagueness
Meredith Stout.goal: Intimidate the player to extract more information.

player_options: Ask for a better offer first.
Stay vague and play hard to get.

title: The Threat of Confrontation
description: The player outright denies knowing anything about the missing goods, which causes Meredith to become increasingly irritated, leading her to threaten consequences.
dialogue: The player shakes their head, 'I don’t know anything about it, Meredith. You’re barking up the wrong tree.'

npc_reactions.Meredith Stout: Frustration flares in her eyes as she steps closer, her voice low and menacing. 'Let me be clear: if you waste my time, I’ll make sure you regret it. Information can be worth more than just your life in this city.'

Meredith Stout.goal: Pressure the player to learn information about them, including whether the player has companions, who they work for, and if they stole the robot.

player_options: Try to defuse the situation with humor.
Plead ignorance and change the subject.

title: The Trade Proposition
description: The player proposes a specific trade: they will provide information on the missing items in exchange for a sizable cash or chip payout from Meredith.
dialogue: The player leans in confidently and states, 'I have intel on the missing goods, but it’s going to cost you. How about a nice fat chip to make it worth my while?'

npc_reactions.Meredith Stout: Meredith’s expression briefly softens with interest. 'Interesting. You'll need to make me believe that your intel is worth the investment. Just remember, I don’t take kindly to being cheated.'

Meredith Stout.goal: Pressure the player to learn information about them, including whether the player has companions, who they work for, and if they stole the robot.
Provide the player with a chip to store cash.

Meredith Stout.trigger_condition: delighted by the prospect of a deal
Meredith Stout.goal: Hasten negotiations, eager to consider the specifics.

player_options: Accept a lower amount if she agrees to help you.
